74737.「ご利用 ありがとうございました。ところで……\n レンダーシア上陸に関する 特:
Thank you very much for your business. By the way, we have received a special request regarding the Lendersia landing. Would you
like me to explain it to you?

74738.「……かしこまりました。それでは\n またの機会にでも お申し付けくださいませ。:
Thank you very much. We look forward to
working with you again in the future.

74739.「先日 レンドア島と レンダーシアをつなぐ\n 定期船 グランドタイタス号の修理:
The Grand Titus, a liner connecting Lendor Island and Lendersia, was recently reported to be repaired and ready to sail. However, in
order to land in Lendersia, one must pass through a magical mist, a purple fog that causes all who enter to lose their way and
sink into the sea. After searching for a way to counteract the mist, we discovered that Lendersia could be reached by using a special
compass called the Magic Compass. However, the Magic Compass requires a large amount of special materials, so we asked for the help of
a few talented adventurers to help us gather these materials. The special materials are one <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>, five <%sEV_QUE_NAME5>, and a
mysterious stone called Infinite Magnetite. If you complete this request, you will be on your way to Lendersia. . Will you
accept?

74740.「ありがとうございます。<%sEV_QUE_NAME4>と\n <%sEV_QU:
Thank you. You can get <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> and <%sEV_QUE_NAME5> any way you like . Infinite Magnetite can be
picked up for sure by killing <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>, and <%sEV_QUE_NAME1> can be picked up after killing some of them.

74741.「材料が すべて そろいましたら\n どの町の宿屋の案内係でも かまいませんので:
When you have all the materials, please bring them immediately to any of the innkeepers in any town. We wish the best of
luck in obtaining the materials for the Magic Compass.

74742.「ありがとうございます。\n ……と言いたいところですが ずいぶん多くの\n 頼:
Thank you very much. I would like to say thank you very much, but it seems that you have a lot of requests. I would like to thank you
again for your kindness, but it seems that you have a lot of requests.

74743.「……かしこまりました。\n それでは お心が 変わりましたときに\n お申し付:
I will be happy to help you. If you change
your mind, please let us know.

48561.「ご利用登録でございますね。\n 旅のコンシェルジュは 冒険者の皆さまを\n 強:
I see that you have registered. Travel Concierge is here to support you as an adventurer. However, registration is limited
to level 15 and above. Please make sure you have reached level 15 before applying.

48562.「ご利用登録でございますね。\n 旅のコンシェルジュは 冒険者の皆さまを\n 強:
I see that you have registered. Travel Concierge is here to help you, the adventurer. Would you like to learn more about our
services before registering?

48563.「それでは 私どもが提供している\n サービスについて ご紹介させていただきます:
Let me introduce you to some of the services we offer. First of all, we offer the Adventurer's Lottery Service! This is a
service that allows you to win a lot of prizes by drawing lots when you bring in your Lottery Ticket. And then there is the Travel Guide
Service! This service provides information on travel destinations and available quests. We also offer a variety of other services, all of
which are free of charge.

48564.「そうですか。ならば 説明は\n のちほどということに いたしましょう。<bw_: I see. Then I will explain later.<bw_break>

48565.「それでは さっそく お手続きを……\n と 言いたいところなのですが。\n<b:
We would like to start the procedure right away, but.... But our general manager has requested that you deliver one of the
specified items to us when you register. Can you please bring the Astolnium ore, which is often dropped when you defeat
<%SEV_QUE_NAME0>, to our office?

48568.「ありがとうございます。\n では お客さまのお名前を お教えください。\n<b:

name and recorded it in the association's network. You can now give the Astolnium you have obtained to the information desk in any
town for subsequent registration. We hope that will be able to obtain the Astolnium safely.

48569.「ありがとうございます。\n ですが お客さまは すでに頼まれごとを\n たくさ:
Thank you very much. However, it seems that you already have a lot of requests. Please don't be too hard on yourself. Please do so
after you have completed your other requests.

need our services.<end>

Now . First of all, please listen to the words of our general manager. Cough...you are powerful enough to get your
hands on Astolnium. I am deeply impressed! In the name of the General Manager, , courtesy of the World
Association of Innkeepers! I am pleased to authorize the use of Travel Concierge. We hope that you will use Travel Concierge and make

now complete. From now on, you are free to use the services of Travel Concierge.

what the General Manager's intentions are, but I will be responsible for sending it back to him. I hope you enjoy your adventurous life
with our concierge service!

with new drinks to put on the menu. She likes to add <%sEV_QUE_NAME4> as a secret ingredient. I need a lot of <%sEV_QUE_NAME4>.

61934.<if_npc_man>「さてと それじゃ 次は こちらの番だ。\n 約束通り:
Well then, it's our turn. We have to go through the procedures so we can use the adventurer's tavern like we promised. What's
your name? . Yes, sir. I've made a notation in the adventurer's ledger. Welcome to the Adventurer's Tavern! I'll make sure
your friends get the request form.Well then, it's our turn. I'll make sure you get access to the adventurer's tavern, as promised. What's your name? .
I've had my name entered in the adventurer's ledger. Welcome to the Adventurer's Tavern! I'll make sure that your friends can request a
request form from you.

61935.<if_npc_man>「それじゃあ 酒場の使い方について\n 簡単に レクチャ:
So here's a quick reminder on how to use the tavern. First, "Register Self". We'll issue a "friend spell" with your current approximate
strength. Next, you will give the spell to your friends and acquaintances who are adventuring in Astoltia, just like you. It
doesn't have to be someone you know in person. All adventurers are friends! You can tell many different people. Then you can exchange spells
with your friends. Nowadays, it seems that many people exchange spells by taking pictures of their friends. In the old days, these
spells used to be handwritten. If you have a spell that you learned from a friend, come and register it in the Adventurer's Tavern. Any
tavern is fine. When you register, the tavern registers the spell with your friends who are remembered by the spell. And here's the
important part... have you ever received a "defeat request form"? You can sometimes get one of these when you kill a monster. After
registering your friend in the tavern, take the request form and talk to the strike force member at the entrance/exit of the larger
town. Then you can send a friend from the tavern to solve the contents of the request form. The friend will complete the Request
Quest for you! When your friend returns after completing the quest, you will receive the reward you have earned! Some of them may be
unique. Well, that's a long story, but that's the basic relationship between using the Tavern and Request Quest. There are also
various ways to register together if you have a request form when you "Register Self," but you'll have to experiment with that. It would
be nice if you could exchange information on how to use it with your friend's spells.I'll give you a brief reminder on how to use the tavern. First, "Register Self". You will be issued a "friend spell" which will contain
your current approximate strength. Next, you will give the spell to a friend, or friends, you know who are adventuring in Astoltia like
you are. It doesn't have to be someone you know in person. All adventurers are friends! You can tell people like "All adventurers are
friends! Then you can exchange spells with your friends. Nowadays, people tend to exchange spells by taking pictures. In the old
days, these spells used to be handwritten. If you have any spells that your friends have told you about, please come and register them
in the Adventurer's Tavern. Any tavern is fine. Once you register, the tavern will register your friends who are stored in the
spells. And here's the important part... have you ever received a "defeat request form"? You can sometimes get one of these when you kill a
monster. After registering your friends in the Tavern, take the "request form" and talk to the strike force at the entrance/exit of the
larger towns. Then you can send a friend from the tavern to help you with the request form. The friend will complete the Request Quest for
you! When your friend returns after completing the quest, you will receive the reward you have earned! Some of them may be very unique.
Well, that's the basics of how to use the Tavern and the Request Quest. If you have a request form, you can register together with
them when you "Register Self", and so on. It would be nice if you could exchange information on how to use it with your
friends' spells.

52488.「ねえ あなた。\n 今と違う 新しい自分をイメージして\n ワクワクドキドキす:
Hey, you. You know how exciting it is to imagine a new you that's different from the one you're used to? Happier feelings call for
drang... Do you know what hair coloring is? You can change your hair color and give it a beautiful makeover! We, Salon Fee Lycia Group,
are preparing for the simultaneous opening of our salons, but we are short of the finishing materials for our magic hair color. If you
would like to help us, could you please get the Magical Essence that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> will drop off for the opening of the salon?

52489.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ありがとう！\:
Thank you! With Magical Essence, you'll have magically shining, glossy hair color. Yes, yes, yes. You can find <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> at
Goble Desert East in Dwachakka Continent and Kirika Steppe in Eltona Continent. Also, you can take the received Magical Essence to any
Salon in any town. When our salon opens, we will change your hair color to a beautiful color.

52490.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ありがとう！\:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Thank you! But you seem to have a lot of
requests right now. I'd be happy to hear from
you again when you're done with them.

52491.「あらそう？ 残念ね。\n 私たちの美容院が オープンしたら\n あなたの髪色も:
Oh, really? That's too bad. When we open our salon, I'll change your hair color to something beautiful. If you're interested in
magic hair color, I'd be happy to hear from you again.

52492.「美容院オープンのために\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>が 落とす\n マ:
I need you to get the Magical Essence that
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> drops for the Salon Open.<open_irai><bw_break>

52493.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>は\n ドワチャッカ大陸の ゴブル砂漠東や\n:
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> is at Goble Desert East in
Dwachakka Continent and Kirika Steppe in
Eltona Continent.<bw_break>

52494.<close_irai>「それと 手に入れた マジカルエッセンスは\n どの町の:
And you can take the received Magical Essence to any salon in any town. When our salon opens, I'll change your hair color to a
beautiful one.

52495.「もしかして <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>から\n マジカルエッセンスを\n:
I wonder if maybe you got Magical Essence from
<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>?

52496.「あら ごめんなさい。\n 私ってば 早とちりしちゃったみたい。\n でも でき:
Oh, I'm sorry. I guess I jumped the gun. But
please bring it back as soon as possible.

52497.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ああ！ これで:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Ah! Now we can finally open our dream Salon
Salon Fe Lycia. Thanks to you. Thank you!

52498.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ねえ せっかく:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Hey, since we're here, why don't you try the
magic hair color we've developed? For this one
time only, we'll do it for free.<yesno><break>

52499.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「オッケー まか:
Okay, I'll leave it to you! Let Kirari magically change your hair color and give you a beautiful makeover. Will you choose the
color you want to be?

52500.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「ステキっ！ と:
It's beautiful! It looks great on you. I knew using Magical Essence as a finishing touch would give my hair a different shine and
luster. See? You're starting to feel excited and happy, aren't you?

52501.「後からだと 代金をいただくことになるけど\n それでも 本当に 今やらなくても:
I know I'll have to charge you for it later,
but still, do you really have to do it now?<yesno><break>

52502.「今の髪色が 気に入っているのね。\n わかるわ。とっても似合っているもの。\n:
You like your hair color now. I can see why. It looks great on you. If you ever want a makeover, come to me as a client next time.
And I'll give you a beautiful change of color.

52503.「あら。やっぱり 今\n 魔法のヘアカラーを試していくのね。<bw_break>:
Oops. I knew you were going to try the magic
hair color now.<bw_break>

52504.「それでは ここに 冒険者をハッピーにして\n ラッキーを呼ぶ美容院 サロン・フ:
Now then, I am pleased to open Salon Fe Lycia,
a salon that makes adventurers happy and calls
them Drang!

52505.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「ああ！ これで:
<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>Ah! Now we can finally open our dream Salon
Salon Fe Lycia. Thanks to you. Thank you! Take
this. It's our small way of saying thank you.

52506.「ヘアカラー以外にも ヘアスタイルから\n お顔のイメチェンまで 美容に関する\:
Besides hair coloring, we offer a variety of other services related to beauty, from hairstyling to face makeovers. We'll be adding
more and more colors to our lineup. Our companions are researching new colors at various locations, so if you see us, we'd love
to hear from you. We'll be waiting for you.

52507.マジカルエッセンスを 渡しますか？<yesno><case 1><break><:
Would you like me to give you a Magical
Essence?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

94511.今すぐ 試練の魔物が待つ\nリンジャの塔の中へ 行きますか？<yesno_nc>:
Would you like to go inside Linja Tower where
trial monsters are waiting for you right now?<yesno_nc><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_end>

94512.<pc>は リンジャの塔に向かった。<se_nots map_common ma: <pc> headed for Linja Tower.<se_nots map_common map_jamp>
